portfolio.title: EasyItPoint Landing Page
portfolio.description: An agency website that provides services like SEO, Web Design and development, and Graphic Design. I have used pure HTML, CSS, and Javascript to build this website and deploy it to Github pages.

portfolio.title: Saj Architechture
portfolio.description: An architecture agency website that describes their agency and showcases their recent architectural projects. I have used React JS and Sass to build this website and deploy it to Netlify.

portfolio.title: Saj Crypto
portfolio.description: A cryptocurrency website that shows information and news about cryptocurrencies. I have added functionality where users can mark their favorite currency to their favorite page and visit them any time. I have used React JS and Material UI to build the UI, and I have also used Redux Persist to manage states and RTK Query to fetch the data from CoingGecko and Bing news search API.

portfolio.title: Saj Estate
portfolio.description: A property listing website that shows information about properties that a user can buy or rent. I have used Next JS and Sass to build the UI, and Strapi headless CMS as a backend. I have used Graphql to fetch data and Context API to manage states.

portfolio.title: Ecommerceo
portfolio.description: An eCommerce website where a customer buys products. I have implemented a filtering option that sorts the products by their category. I have used Next js and Sass to build the UI and Sanity headless CMS as a backend. I am fetching data using GROQ and managing states using Context API.
